comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: your podcast on youtube?i'd be interested to listen to your previous interviews. you should be able to get some subscribers here if you just posted the link. you're going to post the profile link of the users you interview here right? comments.author: Greg Tonoski
comments.body: Forgot to mention Splicing hype mid-year (https://bitcoinops.org/en/topics/splicing/).

comments.author: FinePoine0
comments.body: Quote from: Greg Tonoski on January 18, 2024, 02:37:32 PMThere is the link to audio recording: "https://youtu.be/ITcgzXAqbsI".2023 was the best time to invest in Bitcoin. Bitcoin was in decline in 2022, and from early January 2023 the price of Bitcoin was bullish and until December the price of Bitcoin was only bullish. If the investment could have been made according to the price of Bitcoin in January 2023, it would have increased by several times now. So I consider 2023 to be a fundamental investment. I think 2023 is the best time to invest.

comments.author: carbone9090
comments.body: Quote from: FinePoine0 on January 21, 2024, 02:58:13 AMQuote from: Greg Tonoski on January 18, 2024, 02:37:32 PMThere is the link to audio recording: "https://youtu.be/ITcgzXAqbsI".2023 was the best time to invest in Bitcoin. Bitcoin was in decline in 2022, and from early January 2023 the price of Bitcoin was bullish and until December the price of Bitcoin was only bullish. If the investment could have been made according to the price of Bitcoin in January 2023, it would have increased by several times now. So I consider 2023 to be a fundamental investment. I think 2023 is the best time to invest.I'm totally agree with you. Bitcoin has already made it's 35,000+ percent profit over time. Now, it can be considered as a good addition to a pension, but only in the long term. For Bitcoin to make 5-10x from its current level will take 5-10 years.
